title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.6 - Municipality/corporation relationship
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2002.6 - Municipality/corporation relationship

State Regulations

Any agreement between the corporation and a municipality
shall contain provision that the corporation shall act as agent of the
municipality in all matters concerning the project. All obligations or
liabilities incurred by this corporation with respect to the project shall be
incurred by the corporation as agent of the municipality and not as
principal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2002.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
